thread.section_title: The Independent Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice hotel next to central station, amazing service !
thread.title_full: Nice hotel next to central station, amazing service ! - Review of The Independent Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Daniella G
title: Nice hotel next to central station, amazing service !
text:
Pros: close to the central station Termini, big rooms, incredible service!!! We had a bartender named Massimo who took care of us every night with drinks and desserts.. receptionists are kind and helpful. Also very clean hotel and nice rooftop.
Cons: problematic shower and toilet.. really not comfortable, tiny elevator and corridors... not so rich breakfast. location isn't good for going out or having a dinner.
